title: Lewandowski and Pajor centre stage on Barça One
body_text:
Lewandowski and Pajor centre stage on Barça One

When FC Barcelona want goals, look no further than Ewa Pajor and Robert Lewandowski. The leading scorers in their respective leagues have sat down for a chat in their native tongue Polish. Set to the backdrop of the Ciutat Esportiva, their conversation forms part of the second programme in the Barça One Face to Face
Have a listen to the topics discussed by the centre forwards for the men's and women's teams. Both FC Barcelona number nines have a lot in common beyond being Polish and goalscoring, for example, they both spent time playing in Germany. A very entertaining conversation focuses on football, but also gives a glimpse into the more personal sides of Ewa Pajor and Robert Lewandowski.
